author: larde.victor
title: Open source scalable OST ecosystem
description: The spread of Contributionism and the success of OST plan will create a huge demand for town's personalized tools, owned by the community.
solution: Built on Cardano, the One Small Town ecosystem will be open source and scalable at will by all new signed towns around the world.
experience: Researcher - Scientist - Author - Activist - Humanitarian. Senior Financial Planner. Coach in blockchain & cryptocurrency. Business Planner.
